ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a great take-along side dish for a summer picnic. It's deliciously crunchy and it holds up well. You can find a recipe for the lime-cilantro dressing on this site. I used a wonderful recipe submitted by Lin."
ins: Mix feta cheese, red bell pepper, jicama, carrot, celery, walnuts, red cabbage, savoy cabbage, cilantro-lime dressing, red onion, and jalapeno pepper together in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
